page.title: 11TRAFFIC SURVEY OF THE AREA.
page.content: {Several children from Birchfield School conducted a traffic survey to cover the 4 main roads leading into and out of Leeds.{(M621,Geldard {Rd,Victoria Rd & Whitehall Rd.)The survey results were for the period 9.30-10.30am.% of private cars using the 4 roads(Both directions) {M621=54% Geldard Rd=16% {Victoria Rd=19% Whitehall Rd=11% Total no of vehicles(all types)using the 4 roads. M621=2,229(55.3%) {Geldard Rd=617(15.3%) Whitehall {Rd=456 (11.3%) Victoria Rd=725 (18%) {Total no. of vehicles=4027. From our survey we found that the M621 was the busiest of the 4 roads.The reason for this being that it is a motorway and much of the traffic passed through Leeds.{The M621 carried the majority of commercial traffic {(84.6% of all heavy lorries).
